numcodecs 0.12.1

pip install numcodecs

Latest version

Released: Oct 18, 2023

A Python package providing buffer compression and transformation codecs for use in data storage and communication applications.

Project description

Numcodecs is a Python package providing buffer compression and transformationcodecs for use in data storage and communication applications.
